question: Who among the following leaders led the Revolt of 1857 in Bareilly?
explanation: Khan Bahadur Khan Rohilla, the grandson of Hafiz Rahmat Khan, set up his own government in Bareilly in the Revolt of 1857 against British. But, the revolt was suppressed by the British forces under the command of Colin Champbell. Khan Bahadur Khan was sentenced to death and hanged in the Kotwali on February 24,1860.
